events.title: NIGHT_TRACK_SESSIONS
events.description: An exclusive high-performance track event under the floodlights. Open for Stage 2 and above builds for thermal testing and lap timing.

events.title: AERO_COMPOSITE_LAB
events.description: A deep dive into advanced aerodynamics and carbon fiber manufacturing. Learn how we reduce drag and optimize downforce for street-legal monsters.

events.title: DYNO_POWER_MEET
events.description: The ultimate power shootout. Test your machine's actual wheel horsepower and torque curves on our calibrated Mustang Dyno.

events.title: ALGORITHM_CALIBRATION_DAY
events.description: Live ECU remapping demonstrations. Watch our engineers extract hidden potential while maintaining reliability through precise fuel-air mapping.

events.title: COASTAL_MIDNIGHT_RUN
events.description: A strictly invitation-only midnight cruise through the city's quietest tunnels. Built for the sound of high-revving engines and anti-lag pops.

events.title: CHASSIS_DYNAMICS_CAMP
events.description: Understanding weight transfer, body roll, and damping. Bring your car for a professional corner-weighting session and alignment optimization.

events.title: FORCED_INDUCTION_FORUM
events.description: Technical seminar on turbocharger sizing, intercooler efficiency, and managing heat soak in tropical climates.

events.title: SURFACE_PROTECTION_EXPO
events.description: Showcasing the latest in self-healing ceramic coatings and paint protection films (PPF). Keep your build's finish as sharp as its performance.

events.title: QUARTER_MILE_TRIALS
events.description: Raw acceleration testing. No excuses, just the clock. Electronic timing with 60ft, 330ft, and 1/8th mile traps recorded.

events.title: PERFAMANA_ANNIVERSARY_05
events.description: Celebrating 5 years of engineering excellence. A gathering of the most significant builds we've ever released from the lab.
